const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "shirts",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      brand: {
        type: "keyword",
      },
      color: {
        type: "keyword",
      },
      model: {
        type: "keyword",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "shirts",
  id: 1,
  refresh: "true",
  document: {
    brand: "gucci",
    color: "red",
    model: "slim",
  },
});
console.log(response1);
